message.content:
The task is to identify and extract the value of the decrease in amounts owed to the entity for goods or services sold or provided on credit during the period. In cash flow statements, this corresponds to the line item:

"(Increase) Decrease in Accounts Receivable"

This line shows the cash effect of changes in amounts owed to the entity.

From the provided data:

| Account                                    | Amount       | Date      |
|--------------------------------------------|--------------|-----------|
| (Increase) Decrease in Accounts Receivable | -15362611.64 | 2024-02-05 |

The amount is -15362611.64, which indicates an increase in accounts receivable (cash outflow).

Since the problem asks for the decrease in amounts owed, the value is exactly the value listed under "(Increase) Decrease in Accounts Receivable".

Hence, the value to report is: -15362611.64

```json
{"solution": {'value': '-15362611.64'} }
```
